items.sentence: Tom, Mary and I usually walk to school together.
Tom looked up from his phone and smiled at Mary.
It didn't take you much time to do that, did it?
Most of our workers feel that they're underpaid.
Even if you yell for help, nobody will hear you.
Tom found a cave big enough for him to sleep in.
Tom threw his cigarette butt out the car window.
I'm going to stay home tomorrow if it's raining.
Tom wasn't sure if he wanted Mary to stay or go.
Tom had never dreamed that he could be so happy.
I want to practice French with a native speaker.
Tom was lucky that his toast fell right side up.
I can't believe people think Tom is intelligent.
I looked out the window and didn't see anything.
This is the street that I was telling you about.
We're going to leave first thing in the morning.
I'm sorry if it sounded as if I was mocking you.
Life would be nicer if it wasn't so complicated.
I would've thought Tom's French would be better.
I thought you didn't want to be with me anymore.
